title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo – lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Code Llama, Mistral, Gemma et al. locally with a single CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async helpers for chatting with any Ollama model.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official npm package giving Node & browsers a typed wrapper around the Ollama REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: Zero-friction LangChain LLM and embeddings integration for Ollama, letting you swap in local models in any chain.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI that talks to a local Ollama instance; no data leaves your box.

title: ollama-cli
summary: TUI (text UI) client written in Go for interactive chatting, history, and model switching inside the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS-Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin SDK wrapping the Ollama REST endpoints; Android-friendly.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Rails or Sinatra apps.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any local Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Curated recipes for common patterns: RAG, function-calling, fine-tuning, multimodal, etc.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker-Compose templates bundling Ollama with Open-WebUI, Weaviate, Postgres and more for one-command stacks.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Qt6 desktop client for Windows/Linux that manages models and chats locally.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Streamlit app showing how to build a private RAG system using Ollama embeddings + Chroma.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server that exposes Ollama functions to AI agents for tool use.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible builds of Ollama and common models for NixOS.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models in pipelines for QA, summarization, generative RAG.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an AI sidebar powered by any Ollama model for brainstorming, summarizing notes.
